summary: kaitlyn granado , 24 , a teacher at macarthur high school in irving , texas , was first arrested on march 19 for having an inappropriate relationship with a 15-year-old student , and was released on bail . now she has been arrested again after another pupil , also accused granado of having sex with him on two consecutive nights in january this year . the teen claims the sexual relationship took place in her car late at night on january 18 and 19 .

Kaitlyn Granado has been suspended from her teaching job and placed on administrative leave by school officials after being accused of having an inappropriate relationship with a 15-year-old student and a second accuser who claims they had a sexual relationship on two consecutive nights in January.
